ComicInfo.Summary:
Sister Fabula helps out a young mother looking to drop off her baby at the church in order to achieve her life’s dreams. Fabula doesn’t have time for such things, so she passes the task on to her latest pupil, Lidia Contrary. Lidia also has her face covered as well, and the young mother wants to know why. The truth lies in a tale involving a lonely man named Otto, and his horrifying quest to getting love.
At the Holy Rose Cemetery lurks Sister Fabula- a mysterious nun who wears a mask and likes to share tales of the macabre with any lonely guest visiting. However, sometimes those guests get to end up in a horror story of their very own! Fabula: Sister of the Dark is a horror anthology, with each issue comes a different story.
